content.raw:
_From [orion.bu...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/117805126661095974338/) on February 25, 2010 13:45:07_

Pytables does not support moving Nodes from one database to another, but it does
support copying. Thus it is unlikely to be able to "convert" a directory archive into
a single-file archive, but perhaps it would not take too long to create a single-file
copy.
content.html:
From orion.bu...@gmail.com on February 25, 2010 13:45:07

Pytables does not support moving Nodes from one database to another, but it does support copying. Thus it is unlikely to be able to "convert" a directory archive into a single-file archive, but perhaps it would not take too long to create a single-file copy.
